alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 8:41AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST, ASCENSION, ST. JAMES, SOUTHEASTERN LIVINGSTON, SOUTHEASTERN IBERVILLE, NORTHWESTERN LAFOURCHE AND ASSUMPTION PARISHES THROUGH 930 AM CST... At 840 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Port Vincent to near Bayou Geneve. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thibodaux, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, St. Gabriel, Gramercy, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent, Springfield, Geismar, Garyville, Supreme, Chackbay, Whitehall, Paincourtville, Convent, and North Vacherie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 173 and 200. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Western Ascension
